data.name: Thing_DynamicGenerator_Description
data.value: Every {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer's} best friend, the portable generator gets you up and running, fast. Fill it with a {THING:ItemGasCanisterFuel} to power up and charge a {THING:ItemBatteryCell}, or attach it to a {THING:StructurePowerConnector} to link it into your electrical network. It's pressure driven, so functions more efficiently at lower temperatures, and REALLY efficiently if supercooled. Perfecting your fuel mix also makes a big difference.
data.comment: Every {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer's} best friend, the portable generator gets you up and running, fast. Fill it with a {THING:ItemGasCanisterFuel} to power up and charge a {THING:ItemBatteryCell}, or attach it to a {THING:StructurePowerConnector} to link it into your electrical network. It's pressure driven, so functions more efficiently at lower temperatures, and REALLY efficiently if supercooled. Perfecting your fuel mix also makes a big difference.

data.name: Thing_DynamicLight_Description
data.value: Philippe Starck might not applaud, but this battery-powered light source undarkens the corners when illumination's lacking. Powered by any battery, it's a 'no-frills' {LINK:Xigo;Xigo} design that can be cheaply fabricated with the minimum of fuss. Unless you like fuss. In which case, fuss all you like.
data.comment: Philippe Starck might not applaud, but this battery-powered light source undarkens the corners when illumination's lacking. Powered by any battery, it's a 'no-frills' {LINK:Xigo;Xigo} design that can be cheaply fabricated with the minimum of fuss. Unless you like fuss. In which case, fuss all you like.

data.name: Thing_DynamicScrubber_Description
data.value: A portable scrubber does just what it sounds like: removes specific substances from the air. For instance, attaching a {THING:ItemGasFilterCarbonDioxide} will pull {GAS:CarbonDioxide} from the surrounding atmosphere. Note that the scrubber has room for one battery and two filters, which will double its operating speed. Neat. When it reaches an internal pressure of 8106kPA, an error signal will flash on the switch, indicating it needs to be emptied. Either vent it directly, or attach it to a pipe network via a {THING:ItemTankConnector} and a {THING:ItemWrench}.
data.comment: A portable scrubber does just what it sounds like: removes specific substances from the air. For instance, attaching a {THING:ItemGasFilterCarbonDioxide} will pull {GAS:CarbonDioxide} from the surrounding atmosphere. Note that the scrubber has room for one battery and two filters, which will double its operating speed. Neat. When it reaches an internal pressure of 8106kPA, an error signal will flash on the switch, indicating it needs to be emptied. Either vent it directly, or attach it to a pipe network via a {THING:ItemTankConnector} and a {THING:ItemWrench}.

data.name: Thing_EntityAlien_Description
data.value: The answer to the age-old question, 'Is there life on other planets?', is 'I guess so.'
data.comment: The answer to the age-old question, 'Is there life on other planets?', is 'I guess so.'

data.name: Thing_EntityChick_Description
data.value: Once a chick is hatched, it gets hungry. It will eat soybeans, corn, and wheat, and lay eggs. Some will be fertilized, producing further chickens. Some will not.
data.comment: Once a chick is hatched, it gets hungry. It will eat soybeans, corn, and wheat, and lay eggs. Some will be fertilized, producing further chickens. Some will not.

data.name: Thing_EntityChickenBrown_Description
data.value: Like so many of its brethren, this is a chicken. A brown one. It will eat soybeans, corn, and wheat, and lay eggs. Some will be fertilized, producing further chickens. Some will not.
data.comment: Like so many of its brethren, this is a chicken. A brown one. It will eat soybeans, corn, and wheat, and lay eggs. Some will be fertilized, producing further chickens. Some will not.

data.name: Thing_EntityChickenWhite_Description
data.value: It's a chicken, as white as moondust. It will eat soybeans, corn, and wheat, and lay eggs. Some will be fertilized, producing further chickens. Some will not.
data.comment: It's a chicken, as white as moondust. It will eat soybeans, corn, and wheat, and lay eggs. Some will be fertilized, producing further chickens. Some will not.

data.name: Thing_EntityGraylien_Description
data.value: While humanity has historically referred to these creatures as 'Greys', they prefer the more inclusive 'Trans-beige' label.
data.comment: While humanity has historically referred to these creatures as 'Greys', they prefer the more inclusive 'Trans-beige' label.

data.name: Thing_EntityRoosterBlack_Description
data.value: This is a rooster. It is black. There is dignity in this.
data.comment: This is a rooster. It is black. There is dignity in this.

data.name: Thing_EntityRoosterBrown_Description
data.value: The common brown rooster. Don't let it hear you say that.
data.comment: The common brown rooster. Don't let it hear you say that.

data.name: Thing_GasTankAir_Description
data.value: Portable gas tanks store gas, and gas only. To refill one, bolt it to a {THING:ItemTankConnector} using a {THING:ItemWrench}, then connect it to a pipe network. Try to avoid pushing it above 100 atmospheres, or you'll taste the delicate flavor of regret. Use tanks to fill a {THING:ItemGasCanisterEmpty} by attaching it to the tank's striped section. Or you could vent it into a sealed room to create an atmosphere, attach it to a rover and take it for a drive, or just use it for loud, expensive target practice.
data.comment: Portable gas tanks store gas, and gas only. To refill one, bolt it to a {THING:ItemTankConnector} using a {THING:ItemWrench}, then connect it to a pipe network. Try to avoid pushing it above 100 atmospheres, or you'll taste the delicate flavor of regret. Use tanks to fill a {THING:ItemGasCanisterEmpty} by attaching it to the tank's striped section. Or you could vent it into a sealed room to create an atmosphere, attach it to a rover and take it for a drive, or just use it for loud, expensive target practice.

data.name: Thing_ItemActiveVent_Description
data.value: When constructed, this kit places an {THING:StructureActiveVent} on any support structure.
data.comment: When constructed, this kit places an {THING:StructureActiveVent} on any support structure.

data.name: Thing_ItemAreaPowerControl_Description
data.value: This kit places a {THING:StructureAreaPowerControl} (APC) on any support structure. The APC kit has two options, selecting which direction you would like the APC power to flow.
data.comment: This kit places a {THING:StructureAreaPowerControl} (APC) on any support structure. The APC kit has two options, selecting which direction you would like the APC power to flow.

data.name: Thing_ItemBatteryCell_Description
Thing_ItemBatteryCellLarge_Description
Thing_ItemBatteryCellNuclear_Description
Thing_ItemBook_Description
data.value: Unlike 8-tracks, laser-disks and email, books never totally vanished. Technology may have evolved, but something about the texture and sexiness of the physical book has seen them endure in a unique, if slightly irrational informational niche.
data.comment: Unlike 8-tracks, laser-disks and email, books never totally vanished. Technology may have evolved, but something about the texture and sexiness of the physical book has seen them endure in a unique, if slightly irrational informational niche.

data.name: Thing_ItemCableCoil_Description
data.value: Bodily metaphors are tired and anthropocentric, but it was Frida Stuppen, the first {LINK:ODA;ODA} Administrator, who said, 'Let the cabling be as the nerve and the vessel, transmitting power and data alike through systems we forge among the stars.' Later commentators suggested that she was simply putting a romantic gloss on a piece of dubious economy. Whatever the case, standard cabling is where any {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer's} network begins. Normal coil has a maximum wattage of 5kW. For higher-current applications, use {THING:ItemCableCoilHeavy}.
data.comment: Bodily metaphors are tired and anthropocentric, but it was Frida Stuppen, the first {LINK:ODA;ODA} Administrator, who said, 'Let the cabling be as the nerve and the vessel, transmitting power and data alike through systems we forge among the stars.' Later commentators suggested that she was simply putting a romantic gloss on a piece of dubious economy. Whatever the case, standard cabling is where any {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer's} network begins. Normal coil has a maximum wattage of 5kW. For higher-current applications, use {THING:ItemCableCoilHeavy}.

data.name: Thing_ItemChemLightBlue_Description
data.value: A safe and slightly rave-some source of blue light. Snap to activate.
data.comment: A safe and slightly rave-some source of blue light. Snap to activate.

data.name: Thing_ItemChemLightGreen_Description
data.value: Enliven the dreariest, airless rock with this glowy green light. Snap to activate.
data.comment: Enliven the dreariest, airless rock with this glowy green light. Snap to activate.

data.name: Thing_ItemChemLightRed_Description
data.value: A red glowstick. Snap to activate. Then reach for the lasers.
data.comment: A red glowstick. Snap to activate. Then reach for the lasers.

data.name: Thing_ItemChemLightWhite_Description
data.value: Snap the glowstick to activate a pale radiance that keeps the darkness at bay.
data.comment: Snap the glowstick to activate a pale radiance that keeps the darkness at bay.

data.name: Thing_ItemChemLightYellow_Description
data.value: Dispel the darkness with this yellow glowstick.
data.comment: Dispel the darkness with this yellow glowstick.

data.name: Thing_ItemCoalOre_Description
data.value: Humanity wouldn't have got to space without humble, combustible coal. Burn it in a {THING:StructureSolidFuelGenerator}, smelt it in the {THING:StructureFurnace} to create {LINK:AlloysPage;alloys}, or use it in the {THING:ApplianceReagentProcessor} to make {THING:ItemSprayCanBlack}.
data.comment: Humanity wouldn't have got to space without humble, combustible coal. Burn it in a {THING:StructureSolidFuelGenerator}, smelt it in the {THING:StructureFurnace} to create {LINK:AlloysPage;alloys}, or use it in the {THING:ApplianceReagentProcessor} to make {THING:ItemSprayCanBlack}.

data.name: Thing_ItemCorn_Description
data.value: A long growth time staple crop. Its low requirement for darkness allows for accelerated growing if provided with extra light.
data.comment: A long growth time staple crop. Its low requirement for darkness allows for accelerated growing if provided with extra light.

data.name: Thing_ItemCrowbar_Description
data.value: {LINK:Recurso;Recurso's} entry-level crowbar is useful in a variety of everyday {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} settings, from opening {THING:StructureAreaPowerControl}s and unpowered {THING:StructureAirlock}s, to splatting pan-dimensional headcrabs, should the need arise.
data.comment: {LINK:Recurso;Recurso's} entry-level crowbar is useful in a variety of everyday {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} settings, from opening {THING:StructureAreaPowerControl}s and unpowered {THING:StructureAirlock}s, to splatting pan-dimensional headcrabs, should the need arise.

data.name: Thing_ItemDrill_Description
data.value: The {LINK:ExMin;ExMin} Off-whirled Hand Drill has been a companion to {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} for decades. Essential for assembling and deconstructing various items and structures, regardless of gravity, pressure or temperature.
data.comment: The {LINK:ExMin;ExMin} Off-whirled Hand Drill has been a companion to {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} for decades. Essential for assembling and deconstructing various items and structures, regardless of gravity, pressure or temperature.

data.name: Thing_ItemDuctTape_Description
data.value: In the distant past, one of Earth's great champions taught a generation of 'Fix-It People' that duct tape was the answer to any problem. {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} have demonstrated that this is truth holds strong, so long as the problem is a damaged {THING:ItemEvaSuit}, {THING:ItemJetpackBasic}, {THING:ItemSpaceHelmet}, or even a {THING:StructureSolarPanel}. To use on yourself: put duct tape in your active hand, hold RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to automatically repair damage.
data.comment: In the distant past, one of Earth's great champions taught a generation of 'Fix-It People' that duct tape was the answer to any problem. {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} have demonstrated that this is truth holds strong, so long as the problem is a damaged {THING:ItemEvaSuit}, {THING:ItemJetpackBasic}, {THING:ItemSpaceHelmet}, or even a {THING:StructureSolarPanel}. To use on yourself: put duct tape in your active hand, hold RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to automatically repair damage.

data.name: Thing_ItemEgg_Description
data.value: Resolving, finally, the question of which came first: it was the egg. Eggs are deposited every 60-90 seconds by your average chicken. If an egg has been fertilized, and is kept between 20C-30C, an {THING:EntityChick} will emerge. For the rest, there is the {THING:ApplianceMicrowave} and all manner of {LINK:FoodPage;gustatory} consolations.
data.comment: Resolving, finally, the question of which came first: it was the egg. Eggs are deposited every 60-90 seconds by your average chicken. If an egg has been fertilized, and is kept between 20C-30C, an {THING:EntityChick} will emerge. For the rest, there is the {THING:ApplianceMicrowave} and all manner of {LINK:FoodPage;gustatory} consolations.

data.name: Thing_ItemEggCarton_Description
data.value: Within, eggs reside in mysterious, marmoreal silence.
data.comment: Within, eggs reside in mysterious, marmoreal silence.

data.name: Thing_ItemEvaSuit_Description
data.value: The EVA suit is the basic suit {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} need to survive in the inhospitable environment of space. For more information on EVA suits, consult the {LINK:EVAPage;EVA suit} guide.
data.comment: The EVA suit is the basic suit {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} need to survive in the inhospitable environment of space. For more information on EVA suits, consult the {LINK:EVAPage;EVA suit} guide.

data.name: Thing_ItemFlour_Description
data.value: Pulverized {THING:ItemWheat}, a key ingredient in many foods created by the {THING:ApplianceMicrowave} and the {THING:ItemKitAutomatedOven}.
data.comment: Pulverized {THING:ItemWheat}, a key ingredient in many foods created by the {THING:ApplianceMicrowave} and the {THING:ItemKitAutomatedOven}.

data.name: Thing_ItemGasCanisterCarbonDioxide_Description
data.value: When fabricated, the {GAS:CarbonDioxide} {SLOT:GasCanister} is filled a pressure of 8000kPa (80 atmospheres) and colored default grey. Used as a secondary fuel in the {THING:ItemJetpackBasic}, it can be mounted to a {THING:DynamicGasCanisterAir} or {THING:StructureGasTankStorage} for refill. Careful not to over pressurize when refilling, or it may go 'bang'.
data.comment: When fabricated, the {GAS:CarbonDioxide} {SLOT:GasCanister} is filled a pressure of 8000kPa (80 atmospheres) and colored default grey. Used as a secondary fuel in the {THING:ItemJetpackBasic}, it can be mounted to a {THING:DynamicGasCanisterAir} or {THING:StructureGasTankStorage} for refill. Careful not to over pressurize when refilling, or it may go 'bang'.

data.name: Thing_ItemGasCanisterPollutants_Description
data.value: While this byproduct from smelting - sometimes known simply as 'X' - is a toxin, its specific heat makes it a valuable coolant. All gas canisters are full when fabricated to a pressure of 8000kPa (80 atmospheres), and can be mounted to a {THING:DynamicGasCanisterAir} or {THING:StructureGasTankStorage} for refill. Careful not to pressurize beyond 10MPa, or it may go 'bang'.
data.comment: While this byproduct from smelting - sometimes known simply as 'X' - is a toxin, its specific heat makes it a valuable coolant. All gas canisters are full when fabricated to a pressure of 8000kPa (80 atmospheres), and can be mounted to a {THING:DynamicGasCanisterAir} or {THING:StructureGasTankStorage} for refill. Careful not to pressurize beyond 10MPa, or it may go 'bang'.

data.name: Thing_ItemGasCanisterEmpty_Description
data.value: The portable {SLOT:GasCanister} is the {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer's} basic unit of {LINK:GasPage;gas} delivery. Rated to a standard pressure of 8000kPa (80 atmospheres), empty gas canisters can be mounted to a {THING:DynamicGasCanisterAir} or {THING:StructureGasTankStorage} for refill. Careful not to pressurize beyond 10MPa, or it may go 'bang'. Contains 64L of gas.
data.comment: The portable {SLOT:GasCanister} is the {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer's} basic unit of {LINK:GasPage;gas} delivery. Rated to a standard pressure of 8000kPa (80 atmospheres), empty gas canisters can be mounted to a {THING:DynamicGasCanisterAir} or {THING:StructureGasTankStorage} for refill. Careful not to pressurize beyond 10MPa, or it may go 'bang'. Contains 64L of gas.

data.name: Thing_ItemGasCanisterFuel_Description
data.value: The orange portable {LINK:GasPage;fuel} {SLOT:GasCanister} supplies a 64L mixture of 66% {GAS:Volatiles}/34% {GAS:Oxygen} for powering such items as the {THING:ItemWeldingTorch} and the {THING:DynamicGenerator}. All gas canisters are full when fabricated to a pressure of 8000kPa (80 atmospheres), and can be mounted to a {THING:DynamicGasCanisterAir} or {THING:StructureGasTankStorage} for refill. Careful not to pressurize beyond 10MPa, or it may go 'bang'.
data.comment: The orange portable {LINK:GasPage;fuel} {SLOT:GasCanister} supplies a 64L mixture of 66% {GAS:Volatiles}/34% {GAS:Oxygen} for powering such items as the {THING:ItemWeldingTorch} and the {THING:DynamicGenerator}. All gas canisters are full when fabricated to a pressure of 8000kPa (80 atmospheres), and can be mounted to a {THING:DynamicGasCanisterAir} or {THING:StructureGasTankStorage} for refill. Careful not to pressurize beyond 10MPa, or it may go 'bang'.

data.name: Thing_ItemGasCanisterNitrogen_Description
data.value: The green portable {GAS:Nitrogen} {SLOT:GasCanister} supplies propellant for the {THING:ItemSpacepack} and the {THING:ItemHardJetpack}. All gas canisters are full when fabricated to a pressure of 8000kPa (80 atmospheres), and can be mounted to a {THING:DynamicGasCanisterAir} or {THING:StructureGasTankStorage} for refill. Careful not to pressurize beyond 10MPa, or it may go 'bang'.
data.comment: The green portable {GAS:Nitrogen} {SLOT:GasCanister} supplies propellant for the {THING:ItemSpacepack} and the {THING:ItemHardJetpack}. All gas canisters are full when fabricated to a pressure of 8000kPa (80 atmospheres), and can be mounted to a {THING:DynamicGasCanisterAir} or {THING:StructureGasTankStorage} for refill. Careful not to pressurize beyond 10MPa, or it may go 'bang'.

data.name: Thing_ItemGasCanisterOxygen_Description
data.value: The white portable 64L {SLOT:GasCanister} is the {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer's} basic unit of {GAS:Oxygen} delivery. All gas canisters are full when fabricated to a pressure of 8000kPa (80 atmospheres), and can be mounted to a {THING:DynamicGasCanisterAir} or {THING:StructureGasTankStorage} for refill. Careful not to pressurize beyond 10MPa, or it may go 'bang'.
data.comment: The white portable 64L {SLOT:GasCanister} is the {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer's} basic unit of {GAS:Oxygen} delivery. All gas canisters are full when fabricated to a pressure of 8000kPa (80 atmospheres), and can be mounted to a {THING:DynamicGasCanisterAir} or {THING:StructureGasTankStorage} for refill. Careful not to pressurize beyond 10MPa, or it may go 'bang'.

data.name: Thing_ItemGasCanisterWater_Description
data.value: The blue portable {GAS:Water} {SLOT:GasCanister} has a 64L capacity, supplying {GAS:Water} to items like the {THING:DynamicHydroponics} unit, or any other connected system. All liquid canisters are full when fabricated to a pressure of 8000kPa (80 atmospheres), and can be mounted to a {THING:DynamicLiquidCanisterEmpty} or {THING:StructureLiquidTankStorage} for refill.
data.comment: The blue portable {GAS:Water} {SLOT:GasCanister} has a 64L capacity, supplying {GAS:Water} to items like the {THING:DynamicHydroponics} unit, or any other connected system. All liquid canisters are full when fabricated to a pressure of 8000kPa (80 atmospheres), and can be mounted to a {THING:DynamicLiquidCanisterEmpty} or {THING:StructureLiquidTankStorage} for refill.

data.name: Thing_ItemGasFilterCarbonDioxide_Description
data.value: Given humanity's obsession with exhaling {GAS:CarbonDioxide}, all {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} are issued two basic {LINK:Sinotai;Sinotai} {GAS:CarbonDioxide} {SLOT:GasFilter} as part of their standard deployment kit (SDK). These filters allow passage of {GAS:CarbonDioxide} into the suit's waste {THING:ItemGasCanisterEmpty}, but are also critical components of the {THING:DynamicScrubber} and the {THING:StructureFiltration}. The {THING:ItemGasFilterCarbonDioxideM} and {THING:ItemGasFilterCarbonDioxideL} are also available.
data.comment: Given humanity's obsession with exhaling {GAS:CarbonDioxide}, all {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} are issued two basic {LINK:Sinotai;Sinotai} {GAS:CarbonDioxide} {SLOT:GasFilter} as part of their standard deployment kit (SDK). These filters allow passage of {GAS:CarbonDioxide} into the suit's waste {THING:ItemGasCanisterEmpty}, but are also critical components of the {THING:DynamicScrubber} and the {THING:StructureFiltration}. The {THING:ItemGasFilterCarbonDioxideM} and {THING:ItemGasFilterCarbonDioxideL} are also available.

data.name: Thing_ItemGasFilterPollutants_Description
data.value: Filters are used to capture various gases, such as waste emissions from a {THING:StructureFurnace} or {THING:StructureArcFurnace}. Adding {LINK:Sinotai;Sinotai}-designed {GAS:Pollutant} filters to a {THING:ItemDynamicScrubber} allows you to isolate this gas, then add it to a pipe network and employ its excellent coolant properties in a {THING:StructureWallCooler}. Try not to inhale.
data.comment: Filters are used to capture various gases, such as waste emissions from a {THING:StructureFurnace} or {THING:StructureArcFurnace}. Adding {LINK:Sinotai;Sinotai}-designed {GAS:Pollutant} filters to a {THING:ItemDynamicScrubber} allows you to isolate this gas, then add it to a pipe network and employ its excellent coolant properties in a {THING:StructureWallCooler}. Try not to inhale.

data.name: Thing_ItemGasFilterNitrogen_Description
data.value: Filters are used to capture various gases, which can be disposed of or used elsewhere. {GAS:Nitrogen} is a byproduct of smelting various ores, notably {THING:ItemNitrice}, which may be combined with {GAS:Oxygen} to make a breathable - and considerably less flammable - atmosphere.
data.comment: Filters are used to capture various gases, which can be disposed of or used elsewhere. {GAS:Nitrogen} is a byproduct of smelting various ores, notably {THING:ItemNitrice}, which may be combined with {GAS:Oxygen} to make a breathable - and considerably less flammable - atmosphere.

data.name: Thing_ItemGasFilterOxygen_Description
data.value: {LINK:Sinotai;Sinotai} have cornered the market in filter design. Their trademarked templates are simple to print and highly efficient at capturing various gases, which can be disposed of or used elsewhere. {GAS:Oxygen} is a common byproduct of smelting various ores, but must be filtered of such impurities as {GAS:Nitrogen} using this filter and various devices, such as the {THING:ItemDynamicScrubber}.
data.comment: {LINK:Sinotai;Sinotai} have cornered the market in filter design. Their trademarked templates are simple to print and highly efficient at capturing various gases, which can be disposed of or used elsewhere. {GAS:Oxygen} is a common byproduct of smelting various ores, but must be filtered of such impurities as {GAS:Nitrogen} using this filter and various devices, such as the {THING:ItemDynamicScrubber}.

data.name: Thing_ItemGasFilterVolatiles_Description
data.value: Filters are used to capture various gases, which can be disposed of or used elsewhere. {GAS:Volatiles} are created by exposing {THING:ItemVolatiles} to heat. The product can then be collected and combined with {GAS:Oxygen} to create fuel, or used within a {THING:StructureFurnace} to smelt ores and create {LINK:IngotPage;alloys}.
data.comment: Filters are used to capture various gases, which can be disposed of or used elsewhere. {GAS:Volatiles} are created by exposing {THING:ItemVolatiles} to heat. The product can then be collected and combined with {GAS:Oxygen} to create fuel, or used within a {THING:StructureFurnace} to smelt ores and create {LINK:IngotPage;alloys}.

data.name: Thing_ItemGasFilterWater_Description
data.value: {LINK:Sinotai;Sinotai} filters are used to capture various gases, which can be disposed of, or used elsewhere. {GAS:Water} can be collected by filtering smelted {THING:ItemIce}
data.comment: {LINK:Sinotai;Sinotai} filters are used to capture various gases, which can be disposed of, or used elsewhere. {GAS:Water} can be collected by filtering smelted {THING:ItemIce}

data.name: Thing_ItemGasTankStorage_Description
data.value: This kit produces a {THING:ItemGasTankStorage} for refilling a {THING:ItemGasCanisterEmpty}.
data.comment: This kit produces a {THING:ItemGasTankStorage} for refilling a {THING:ItemGasCanisterEmpty}.

data.name: Thing_ItemLiquidTankStorage_Description
data.value: This kit produces a {THING:ItemLiquidTankStorage} for refilling a {THING:ItemLiquidCanisterEmpty}.
data.comment: This kit produces a {THING:ItemLiquidTankStorage} for refilling a {THING:ItemLiquidCanisterEmpty}.

data.name: Thing_ItemGlassSheets_Description
data.value: A fundamental construction component, glass sheets are created from {REAGENT:Silicon}. Fabricated on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}, they are used to make {THING:StructureSolarPanel;Solar Panels}, {THING:StructureAirlock;Airlocks} and many other structures.
data.comment: A fundamental construction component, glass sheets are created from {REAGENT:Silicon}. Fabricated on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}, they are used to make {THING:StructureSolarPanel;Solar Panels}, {THING:StructureAirlock;Airlocks} and many other structures.

data.name: Thing_ItemCopperIngot_Description
data.value: Copper ingots are created by smelting {THING:ItemCopperOre} in the {THING:StructureFurnace} and {THING:StructureArcFurnace}, and used to create a variety of items.
data.comment: Copper ingots are created by smelting {THING:ItemCopperOre} in the {THING:StructureFurnace} and {THING:StructureArcFurnace}, and used to create a variety of items.

data.name: Thing_ItemCopperOre_Description
data.value: Copper is a chemical element with the symbol "Cu". This common and highly conductive material is found on most astronomical bodies and is used in a variety of manufacturing processes including electronic components, alloys, and wires.
data.comment: Copper is a chemical element with the symbol "Cu". This common and highly conductive material is found on most astronomical bodies and is used in a variety of manufacturing processes including electronic components, alloys, and wires.

data.name: Thing_ItemGoldIngot_Description
data.value: There is an enduring paradox at the heart of the {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} project: An initiative conceived as 'cut-price space exploration' uses {REAGENT:Gold} as a fundamental ingredient in fabricating so much of its equipment and materiel.
data.comment: There is an enduring paradox at the heart of the {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} project: An initiative conceived as 'cut-price space exploration' uses {REAGENT:Gold} as a fundamental ingredient in fabricating so much of its equipment and materiel.

data.name: Thing_ItemGoldOre_Description
data.value: Surprisingly common throughout the Solar System, {REAGENT:Gold} is thought to originate in the heart of supernovas, gathering as dust in the early stages of solar formation, then incorporating into the slowly accreting planetary bodies. Now a prized element in {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} construction, {REAGENT:Gold} is valued not for its beauty, but its reliability: inert, durable, conductive and highly stable, gold's strength is that it does nothing.
data.comment: Surprisingly common throughout the Solar System, {REAGENT:Gold} is thought to originate in the heart of supernovas, gathering as dust in the early stages of solar formation, then incorporating into the slowly accreting planetary bodies. Now a prized element in {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} construction, {REAGENT:Gold} is valued not for its beauty, but its reliability: inert, durable, conductive and highly stable, gold's strength is that it does nothing.

data.name: Thing_ItemGrenade_Description
data.value: Invented by the Romans, who threw Greek Fire at their enemies in ceramic jars, the word 'grenade' is derived from the Old French word for 'pomegranate', as many modern grenades resemble this round, many-seeded fruit. Also like many grenades before it, this one goes boom and breaks stuff.
data.comment: Invented by the Romans, who threw Greek Fire at their enemies in ceramic jars, the word 'grenade' is derived from the Old French word for 'pomegranate', as many modern grenades resemble this round, many-seeded fruit. Also like many grenades before it, this one goes boom and breaks stuff.

data.name: Thing_ItemHat_Description
data.value: As the name suggests, this is a hat.
data.comment: As the name suggests, this is a hat.

data.name: Thing_ItemHealPill_Description
data.value: Three centuries of pharmaceutical technology compressed into one small, easy to ingest pill: the Heal Pill, aka the Proton Pill, aka Mr Happy contains active enzymes, therapeutic proteins, modified microbial strains, and mammalian cell line analogues in a single-dose boost of high purity, efficacy, and potency that potentiates a swift parasympathetic immune response.
data.comment: Three centuries of pharmaceutical technology compressed into one small, easy to ingest pill: the Heal Pill, aka the Proton Pill, aka Mr Happy contains active enzymes, therapeutic proteins, modified microbial strains, and mammalian cell line analogues in a single-dose boost of high purity, efficacy, and potency that potentiates a swift parasympathetic immune response.

data.name: Thing_ItemHEMDroidRepairKit_Description
data.value: Repairs damaged HEM-Droids to full health.
data.comment: Repairs damaged HEM-Droids to full health.

data.name: Thing_ItemDisposableBatteryCharger_Description
data.value: Consumable battery the recharges your suit battery. If used on a HEM-Droid it will recharge the HEM-Droids internal battery.
data.comment: Consumable battery the recharges your suit battery. If used on a HEM-Droid it will recharge the HEM-Droids internal battery.

data.name: Thing_ItemHydroponicTray_Description
data.value: This kits creates a {THING:StructureHydroponicsTray} for growing various plants.
data.comment: This kits creates a {THING:StructureHydroponicsTray} for growing various plants.

data.name: Thing_ItemIce_Description
data.value: Water ice can be found on most planets in the Solar System, though not all worlds visited by {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} possess this resource. Highly sensitive to temperature, ice will begin to melt as soon as it is mined, unless kept in the {THING:ItemMiningBelt}. When melting, ice produces a mixture of {GAS:Steam} and {GAS:Nitrogen} gas.
data.comment: Water ice can be found on most planets in the Solar System, though not all worlds visited by {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} possess this resource. Highly sensitive to temperature, ice will begin to melt as soon as it is mined, unless kept in the {THING:ItemMiningBelt}. When melting, ice produces a mixture of {GAS:Steam} and {GAS:Nitrogen} gas.

data.name: Thing_ItemInsulation_Description
data.value: Mysterious in the extreme, the function of this item is lost to the ages.
data.comment: Mysterious in the extreme, the function of this item is lost to the ages.

data.name: Thing_ItemIronIngot_Description
data.value: The most basic unit of construction available to {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer}-kind, iron ingots are created by smelting {THING:ItemIronOre} in the {THING:StructureFurnace} and {THING:StructureArcFurnace}, and used to create a variety of items.
data.comment: The most basic unit of construction available to {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer}-kind, iron ingots are created by smelting {THING:ItemIronOre} in the {THING:StructureFurnace} and {THING:StructureArcFurnace}, and used to create a variety of items.

data.name: Thing_ItemIronOre_Description
data.value: Abundant throughout the Solar System, iron is the {LINK:OrePage;ore} most commonly used by {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} constructing offworld bases. It can be smelted into both {THING:ItemIronIngot}s and {THING:ItemSteelIngot}s.
data.comment: Abundant throughout the Solar System, iron is the {LINK:OrePage;ore} most commonly used by {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} constructing offworld bases. It can be smelted into both {THING:ItemIronIngot}s and {THING:ItemSteelIngot}s.

data.name: Thing_ItemKitAirlock_Description
data.value: This kit produces a single {THING:StructureAirlock} portal.
data.comment: This kit produces a single {THING:StructureAirlock} portal.

data.name: Thing_ItemKitBattery_Description
data.value: This kit produces a single station {THING:StructureBattery}.
data.comment: This kit produces a single station {THING:StructureBattery}.

data.name: Thing_ItemKitChute_Description
data.value: This kit produces a variety of unpowered chutes.
data.comment: This kit produces a variety of unpowered chutes.

data.name: Thing_ItemKitConsole_Description
data.value: This kit produces a range of {THING:StructureConsole}s and displays such as the {THING:StructureConsoleLED1x2}.
data.comment: This kit produces a range of {THING:StructureConsole}s and displays such as the {THING:StructureConsoleLED1x2}.

data.name: Thing_ItemKitConveyor_Description
data.value: This kit produces conveyor elements, such as the {THING:StructureConveyorStraight}.
data.comment: This kit produces conveyor elements, such as the {THING:StructureConveyorStraight}.

data.name: Thing_ItemKitCryoTube_Description
data.value: This kit produces a range of cryo tubes which can be used to heal players and player organs as well as revive dead players
data.comment: This kit produces a range of cryo tubes which can be used to heal players and player organs as well as revive dead players

data.name: Thing_ItemKitFabricator_Description
data.value: This kit produces a single {THING:StructureFabricator}. (Creative Mode only)
data.comment: This kit produces a single {THING:StructureFabricator}. (Creative Mode only)

data.name: Thing_ItemKitFurniture_Description
data.value: This kit produces a range of {LINK:FurniturePage;furniture}.
data.comment: This kit produces a range of {LINK:FurniturePage;furniture}.

data.name: Thing_ItemKitSensor_Description
data.value: This kit produces a range of sensors, including {THING:StructureGasSensor}, {THING:StructureDaylightSensor}, {THING:StructureMotionSensor}, {THING:StructureProximitySensor} and {THING:StructureOccupancySensor}.
data.comment: This kit produces a range of sensors, including {THING:StructureGasSensor}, {THING:StructureDaylightSensor}, {THING:StructureMotionSensor}, {THING:StructureProximitySensor} and {THING:StructureOccupancySensor}.

data.name: Thing_ItemKitSleeper_Description
data.value: This kit produces a range of sleepers which will keep players hydrated and fed while logged out - as long as a breathable atmosphere is provided.
data.comment: This kit produces a range of sleepers which will keep players hydrated and fed while logged out - as long as a breathable atmosphere is provided.

data.name: Thing_ItemKitSolarPanel_Description
data.value: This kit produces a {THING:StructureSolarPanel} and several variants.
data.comment: This kit produces a {THING:StructureSolarPanel} and several variants.

data.name: Thing_ItemKitStairs_Description
data.value: This kit produces a {THING:StructureStairs4x2} and several variants.
data.comment: This kit produces a {THING:StructureStairs4x2} and several variants.

data.name: Thing_ItemKitTank_Description
data.value: This kit produces either a {THING:StructureTankBig} or {THING:StructureTankSmall}.
data.comment: This kit produces either a {THING:StructureTankBig} or {THING:StructureTankSmall}.

data.name: Thing_ItemKitWall_Description
data.value: This kit produces a range of composite wall elements and windows.
data.comment: This kit produces a range of composite wall elements and windows.

data.name: Thing_ItemLabeller_Description
data.value: A labeller lets you set names and values on a variety of devices and structures, including {THING:StructureConsole} and {LINK:LogicPage;Logic}.
data.comment: A labeller lets you set names and values on a variety of devices and structures, including {THING:StructureConsole} and {LINK:LogicPage;Logic}.

data.name: Thing_ItemLightSword_Description
data.value: A charming, if useless, pseudo-weapon. (Creative only.)
data.comment: A charming, if useless, pseudo-weapon. (Creative only.)

data.name: Thing_ItemMilk_Description
data.value: Full disclosure, it's not actually 'milk', but an {LINK:Agrizero;Agrizero-invented} synthesis of 5ml {THING:ItemSoyOil} and 5g {THING:ItemFern}, delicately blended in the {THING:ApplianceChemistryStation}. Surprisingly filling, it can be used as an ingredient to cook other {LINK:FoodPage;food} in the {THING:ApplianceMicrowave} or {THING:StructureAutomatedOven}. Think, {THING:ItemMuffin}.
data.comment: Full disclosure, it's not actually 'milk', but an {LINK:Agrizero;Agrizero-invented} synthesis of 5ml {THING:ItemSoyOil} and 5g {THING:ItemFern}, delicately blended in the {THING:ApplianceChemistryStation}. Surprisingly filling, it can be used as an ingredient to cook other {LINK:FoodPage;food} in the {THING:ApplianceMicrowave} or {THING:StructureAutomatedOven}. Think, {THING:ItemMuffin}.

data.name: Thing_ItemMiningBelt_Description
data.value: Originally developed by {LINK:Recurso;Recurso Espaciais} for asteroid mining, the {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer's} mining belt has room for two {LINK:ToolPage;tools} and eight {LINK:OrePage;ore} stacks. While wearing the belt, {LINK:OrePage;ore} is automatically stored there when mined. Volatile and temperature-dependent remain stable in the environmentally controlled unit.
data.comment: Originally developed by {LINK:Recurso;Recurso Espaciais} for asteroid mining, the {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer's} mining belt has room for two {LINK:ToolPage;tools} and eight {LINK:OrePage;ore} stacks. While wearing the belt, {LINK:OrePage;ore} is automatically stored there when mined. Volatile and temperature-dependent remain stable in the environmentally controlled unit.

data.name: Thing_ItemMiningDrill_Description
data.value: The handheld 'Topo' tri-cone rotary mining drill was made for one thing: quick digging. Modeled on a classic {LINK:Recurso;Recurso} zero-g design, it functions equally well in vacuum and atmosphere, with cemented carbide bits to increase resilience and bearing life, and reduce spalling. As Jenk Murtons once said, 'The Topo don't stopo.'
data.comment: The handheld 'Topo' tri-cone rotary mining drill was made for one thing: quick digging. Modeled on a classic {LINK:Recurso;Recurso} zero-g design, it functions equally well in vacuum and atmosphere, with cemented carbide bits to increase resilience and bearing life, and reduce spalling. As Jenk Murtons once said, 'The Topo don't stopo.'

data.name: Thing_ItemMuffin_Description
data.value: A delicious, semi-healthful snack, nothing comforts a {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} 800 million kilometers from home like a hand-made muffin.
data.comment: A delicious, semi-healthful snack, nothing comforts a {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} 800 million kilometers from home like a hand-made muffin.

data.name: Thing_ItemPickaxe_Description
data.value: When the sun sets and the {THING:ItemMiningDrill} runs dead, its batteries drained and your {THING:StructureSolarPanel} cold and lifeless, the {THING:StructureAutolathe} empty, the way forward unclear, one thing holds back the endless night of defeat: the trusty pickaxe.
data.comment: When the sun sets and the {THING:ItemMiningDrill} runs dead, its batteries drained and your {THING:StructureSolarPanel} cold and lifeless, the {THING:StructureAutolathe} empty, the way forward unclear, one thing holds back the endless night of defeat: the trusty pickaxe.

data.name: Thing_ItemPillHeal_Description
data.value: Three centuries of pharmaceutical technology compressed into one small, easy to ingest pill: the Heal Pill, aka the Proton Pill, aka Mr Happy contains active enzymes, therapeutic proteins, modified microbial strains, and mammalian cell line analogues in a single-dose boost of high purity, efficacy, and potency that potentiates a swift parasympathetic immune response.
data.comment: Three centuries of pharmaceutical technology compressed into one small, easy to ingest pill: the Heal Pill, aka the Proton Pill, aka Mr Happy contains active enzymes, therapeutic proteins, modified microbial strains, and mammalian cell line analogues in a single-dose boost of high purity, efficacy, and potency that potentiates a swift parasympathetic immune response.

data.name: Thing_ItemPillStun_Description
data.value: Through rarely publicized, the existence of this pill is an open secret. For use when all else has failed, the Sayonara Suppository immobilizes and rapidly ends the average {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer}. The delivery mode ensures that if a Stationeer chooses to take this pill, they really have to want it.
data.comment: Through rarely publicized, the existence of this pill is an open secret. For use when all else has failed, the Sayonara Suppository immobilizes and rapidly ends the average {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer}. The delivery mode ensures that if a Stationeer chooses to take this pill, they really have to want it.

data.name: Thing_ItemReagentMix_Description
data.value: Reagent mix is pure potential. A slurry of undifferentiated {LINK:OrePage;ores}, it is output by the {THING:StructureRecycler} and can be fed into the {THING:StructureCentrifuge} to separate and recover the individual materials. Reagent mix is also output by the {THING:StructureFurnace} when the current contents are ejected without smelting a specific ingot.
data.comment: Reagent mix is pure potential. A slurry of undifferentiated {LINK:OrePage;ores}, it is output by the {THING:StructureRecycler} and can be fed into the {THING:StructureCentrifuge} to separate and recover the individual materials. Reagent mix is also output by the {THING:StructureFurnace} when the current contents are ejected without smelting a specific ingot.

data.name: Thing_ItemRoadFlare_Description
data.value: Designed to burn anywhere in the Solar System, the EZC magnesium fusee supplies its own oxygen to fuel combustion, and dispel the eternal night of space.
data.comment: Designed to burn anywhere in the Solar System, the EZC magnesium fusee supplies its own oxygen to fuel combustion, and dispel the eternal night of space.

data.name: Thing_ItemRTG_Description
data.value: This kit creates that miracle of modern science, a {THING:ItemRTG}.
data.comment: This kit creates that miracle of modern science, a {THING:ItemRTG}.

data.name: Thing_ItemScanner_Description
data.value: A mysterious piece of technology, rumored to have Zrillian origins.
data.comment: A mysterious piece of technology, rumored to have Zrillian origins.

data.name: Thing_ItemScrewdriver_Description
data.value: This standard issue frictional adherence adjustor is a top of the line, bi-rotational model with a columnated uni-grip. It's definitely not just a screwdriver. Use it for construction and deconstruction of certain kits, and setting values on {LINK:LogicUnitPage;logic} units.
data.comment: This standard issue frictional adherence adjustor is a top of the line, bi-rotational model with a columnated uni-grip. It's definitely not just a screwdriver. Use it for construction and deconstruction of certain kits, and setting values on {LINK:LogicUnitPage;logic} units.

data.name: Thing_ItemSecurityCamera_Description
data.value: Security cameras can be paired with a {THING:StructureMotionSensor}, then connected to a {THING:StructureConsole} fitted with a {THING:CircuitboardCameraDisplay} for that 'always watched' feeling.
data.comment: Security cameras can be paired with a {THING:StructureMotionSensor}, then connected to a {THING:StructureConsole} fitted with a {THING:CircuitboardCameraDisplay} for that 'always watched' feeling.

data.name: Thing_ItemSpaceCleaner_Description
data.value: There was a time when humanity really wanted to keep space clean. That time has passed.
data.comment: There was a time when humanity really wanted to keep space clean. That time has passed.

data.name: Thing_ItemSpaceHelmet_Description
data.value: The basic space helmet insulates {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} against everything from hard vacuum to weird cooking smells. Providing a pressure-controlled, breathable atmosphere, it comes with a built-in light powered by your {THING:ItemEvaSuit} {THING:ItemBatteryCell}. It also incorporates a lock/unlock feature to avoid accidental opening, as well as a flush function to expel and replace the internal atmosphere. If damaged, use {THING:ItemDuctTape} to fix it, or paint it any color you like using the {THING:AppliancePaintMixer}.
data.comment: The basic space helmet insulates {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} against everything from hard vacuum to weird cooking smells. Providing a pressure-controlled, breathable atmosphere, it comes with a built-in light powered by your {THING:ItemEvaSuit} {THING:ItemBatteryCell}. It also incorporates a lock/unlock feature to avoid accidental opening, as well as a flush function to expel and replace the internal atmosphere. If damaged, use {THING:ItemDuctTape} to fix it, or paint it any color you like using the {THING:AppliancePaintMixer}.

data.name: Thing_ItemSpacepack_Description
data.value: The basic {LINK:CHAC;CHAC} spacepack isn't 'technically' a jetpack, it's a gas thruster. It can be powered by any gas, so long as the internal pressure of the {LINK:AtmosphericsPage;canister} is higher than the ambient external pressure. If the external pressure is greater, the spacepack will not function. Indispensable for building, mining and general movement, it has ten storage slots and lets {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} fly at 3m/s, compared to the more powerful {THING:ItemJetpackBasic} or {THING:ItemHardJetpack}. Adjusting the thrust value alters your rate of acceleration, while activating the stablizer causes the spacepack to hover when a given height is reached. USE: 'J' to activate; 'space' to fly up; 'left ctrl' to descend; and 'WASD' to move.
data.comment: The basic {LINK:CHAC;CHAC} spacepack isn't 'technically' a jetpack, it's a gas thruster. It can be powered by any gas, so long as the internal pressure of the {LINK:AtmosphericsPage;canister} is higher than the ambient external pressure. If the external pressure is greater, the spacepack will not function. Indispensable for building, mining and general movement, it has ten storage slots and lets {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} fly at 3m/s, compared to the more powerful {THING:ItemJetpackBasic} or {THING:ItemHardJetpack}. Adjusting the thrust value alters your rate of acceleration, while activating the stablizer causes the spacepack to hover when a given height is reached. USE: 'J' to activate; 'space' to fly up; 'left ctrl' to descend; and 'WASD' to move.

data.name: Thing_ItemSprayCanBlack_Description
data.value: Go classic, clandestine or just plain Gothic with black paint, which can be applied to most items. Each can has 20 uses.
data.comment: Go classic, clandestine or just plain Gothic with black paint, which can be applied to most items. Each can has 20 uses.

data.name: Thing_ItemSprayCanBlue_Description
data.value: What kind of a color is blue? The kind of of color that says, 'Hey, what about me?'
data.comment: What kind of a color is blue? The kind of of color that says, 'Hey, what about me?'

data.name: Thing_ItemSprayCanBrown_Description
data.value: In more artistic {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} circles, the absence of brown is often lamented, but seldom changed.
data.comment: In more artistic {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} circles, the absence of brown is often lamented, but seldom changed.

data.name: Thing_ItemSprayCanGreen_Description
data.value: Green is the color of life, and longing. Paradoxically, it's also the color of envy, and tolerance. It denotes sickness, youth, and wealth. But really, it's just what light does at around 500 billionths of a meter.
data.comment: Green is the color of life, and longing. Paradoxically, it's also the color of envy, and tolerance. It denotes sickness, youth, and wealth. But really, it's just what light does at around 500 billionths of a meter.

data.name: Thing_ItemSprayCanGrey_Description
data.value: Arguably the most popular color in the universe, grey was invented so designers had something to do.
data.comment: Arguably the most popular color in the universe, grey was invented so designers had something to do.

data.name: Thing_ItemSprayCanKhaki_Description
data.value: Not so much a single color, as a category of boredom, khaki is the pigmentation equivalent of a mild depressive episode.
data.comment: Not so much a single color, as a category of boredom, khaki is the pigmentation equivalent of a mild depressive episode.

data.name: Thing_ItemSprayCanOrange_Description
data.value: Orange is fun, but also suggestive of hazards. Sitting proudly in the middle of the visual spectrum, it has nothing to prove.
data.comment: Orange is fun, but also suggestive of hazards. Sitting proudly in the middle of the visual spectrum, it has nothing to prove.

data.name: Thing_ItemSprayCanPink_Description
data.value: With the invention of enduring chemical dyes, the 20th century bestowed associations with innocence and tenderness upon this pale tint of red. Yet classically, it was the color of seduction and eroticism. Things change.
data.comment: With the invention of enduring chemical dyes, the 20th century bestowed associations with innocence and tenderness upon this pale tint of red. Yet classically, it was the color of seduction and eroticism. Things change.

data.name: Thing_ItemSprayCanPurple_Description
data.value: Purple is a curious color. You need to be careful with purple. It can be very good, or go horribly, horribly wrong.
data.comment: Purple is a curious color. You need to be careful with purple. It can be very good, or go horribly, horribly wrong.

data.name: Thing_ItemSprayCanRed_Description
data.value: The king of colors, red is perhaps the defining tone of the universe. Linked to blood, royalty, fire and damnation, it is the chromatic expression of power.
data.comment: The king of colors, red is perhaps the defining tone of the universe. Linked to blood, royalty, fire and damnation, it is the chromatic expression of power.

data.name: Thing_ItemSprayCanWhite_Description
data.value: White looks clean, sharp and nice. But {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeering} can be a dirty job. White tends to scuff.
data.comment: White looks clean, sharp and nice. But {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeering} can be a dirty job. White tends to scuff.

data.name: Thing_ItemSprayCanYellow_Description
data.value: A caricature of light itself, yellow lacks the self-confidence of red, or the swagger of purple. It's less fun than orange, but less emotionally limp than khaki. It's hard to know when yellow is appropriate, but it persists as a primary color regardless. Suggesting that yellow gonna yellow, no matter what anyone thinks.
data.comment: A caricature of light itself, yellow lacks the self-confidence of red, or the swagger of purple. It's less fun than orange, but less emotionally limp than khaki. It's hard to know when yellow is appropriate, but it persists as a primary color regardless. Suggesting that yellow gonna yellow, no matter what anyone thinks.

data.name: Thing_ItemSteelFrames_Description
data.value: An advanced and stronger version of {THING:ItemIronFrames}, steel frames are placed by right-clicking. To complete construction, use {THING:ItemSteelSheets} and a {THING:ItemWeldingTorch} in your active hand.
data.comment: An advanced and stronger version of {THING:ItemIronFrames}, steel frames are placed by right-clicking. To complete construction, use {THING:ItemSteelSheets} and a {THING:ItemWeldingTorch} in your active hand.

data.name: Thing_ItemSteelIngot_Description
data.value: Steel ingots are a metal alloy, crafted in a {THING:StructureFurnace} by smelting {THING:ItemIronOre} and {THING:ItemCoalOre} at a ratio of 3:1. It may not be elegant, but {THING:ItemOxite} and {THING:ItemVolatiles} can be combined at a ratio of 1:2 in a furnace to create the necessary gas mixture for smelting.
data.comment: Steel ingots are a metal alloy, crafted in a {THING:StructureFurnace} by smelting {THING:ItemIronOre} and {THING:ItemCoalOre} at a ratio of 3:1. It may not be elegant, but {THING:ItemOxite} and {THING:ItemVolatiles} can be combined at a ratio of 1:2 in a furnace to create the necessary gas mixture for smelting.

data.name: Thing_ItemSteelSheets_Description
data.value: An advanced building material, {THING:ItemSteelIngot} sheets are used when constructing a {THING:StructureFrame} and several other {LINK:StructuresPage;wall} types.
data.comment: An advanced building material, {THING:ItemSteelIngot} sheets are used when constructing a {THING:StructureFrame} and several other {LINK:StructuresPage;wall} types.

data.name: Thing_ItemTablet_Description
data.value: The {LINK:Xigo;Xigo} handheld 'Padi' tablet is an all-purpose data platform, provided as standard issue to all {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers}. A dynamic multi-tool that accepts a range of {LINK:CartridgePage;cartridges}, the Padi becomes an {THING:CartridgeAtmosAnalyser} or {THING:CartridgeTracker}, {THING:CartridgeMedicalAnalyser}, {THING:CartridgeOreScanner}, {THING:CartridgeElectronicReader}, and various other functions.
data.comment: The {LINK:Xigo;Xigo} handheld 'Padi' tablet is an all-purpose data platform, provided as standard issue to all {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers}. A dynamic multi-tool that accepts a range of {LINK:CartridgePage;cartridges}, the Padi becomes an {THING:CartridgeAtmosAnalyser} or {THING:CartridgeTracker}, {THING:CartridgeMedicalAnalyser}, {THING:CartridgeOreScanner}, {THING:CartridgeElectronicReader}, and various other functions.

data.name: Thing_ItemToolBelt_Description
data.value: If there's one piece of equipment that embodies {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} life above all else, it's the humble toolbelt (Editor's note: a recent {LINK:ODA;ODA} survey of iconic Stationeer equipment also rated the smoking, toxic ruins of an over-pressurized {THING:StructureFurnace} lying amid the charred remains of your latest base very highly). Designed to meet the most strict-ish ODA safety standards, the toolbelt's eight slots hold one thing: tools, and {THING:ItemCableCoil}. Not to be confused with the {THING:ItemMiningBelt}.
data.comment: If there's one piece of equipment that embodies {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} life above all else, it's the humble toolbelt (Editor's note: a recent {LINK:ODA;ODA} survey of iconic Stationeer equipment also rated the smoking, toxic ruins of an over-pressurized {THING:StructureFurnace} lying amid the charred remains of your latest base very highly). Designed to meet the most strict-ish ODA safety standards, the toolbelt's eight slots hold one thing: tools, and {THING:ItemCableCoil}. Not to be confused with the {THING:ItemMiningBelt}.

data.name: Thing_ItemUraniumOre_Description
data.value: In 1934, Enrico Fermi noticed that bombarding uranium with neutrons produced a burst of beta rays, and a new material. This process was named 'nuclear fission', and resulted in cheap energy, the Cold War, and countless thousand deaths. While reasonably common throughout the Solar System, {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} are wary of the material.
data.comment: In 1934, Enrico Fermi noticed that bombarding uranium with neutrons produced a burst of beta rays, and a new material. This process was named 'nuclear fission', and resulted in cheap energy, the Cold War, and countless thousand deaths. While reasonably common throughout the Solar System, {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} are wary of the material.

data.name: Thing_ItemWallLight_Description
data.value: This kit creates any one of ten {THING:ItemWallLight} variants.
data.comment: This kit creates any one of ten {THING:ItemWallLight} variants.

data.name: Thing_ItemWeldingTorch_Description
data.value: Stored in the standard issue {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} {THING:ItemToolBelt}, the Arlite welding torch is used to construct a range of essential structures. An upgraded version of the classic 'Zairo' model first manufactured by {LINK:ExMin;ExMin} for modular space habitat assembly, the Arlite is powered by a single {THING:ItemGasCanisterFuel} and designed to function equally well in deep space and deep gravity wells.
data.comment: Stored in the standard issue {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} {THING:ItemToolBelt}, the Arlite welding torch is used to construct a range of essential structures. An upgraded version of the classic 'Zairo' model first manufactured by {LINK:ExMin;ExMin} for modular space habitat assembly, the Arlite is powered by a single {THING:ItemGasCanisterFuel} and designed to function equally well in deep space and deep gravity wells.

data.name: Thing_ItemWheat_Description
data.value: A classical symbol of growth and new life, wheat takes a moderate time to grow. Its main use is to create {LINK:ReagentPage;flour} using the {THING:ApplianceReagentProcessor}.
data.comment: A classical symbol of growth and new life, wheat takes a moderate time to grow. Its main use is to create {LINK:ReagentPage;flour} using the {THING:ApplianceReagentProcessor}.

data.name: Thing_ItemWireCutters_Description
data.value: Wirecutters allow you to deconstruct various {LINK:StructurePage;structures}, as well as cross-lay cables when held in your non-active hand, and defuse explosives as needed. Wirecutters are stored in the {THING:ItemToolBelt}, along with other essential {LINK:ToolPage;tools}.
data.comment: Wirecutters allow you to deconstruct various {LINK:StructurePage;structures}, as well as cross-lay cables when held in your non-active hand, and defuse explosives as needed. Wirecutters are stored in the {THING:ItemToolBelt}, along with other essential {LINK:ToolPage;tools}.

data.name: Thing_ItemWrench_Description
data.value: One of humanity's enduring contributions to the cosmos, the wrench represents the essence of our species. A simple, effective and spiritually barren tool, use it to build and deconstruct a variety of {LINK:StructurePage;structures}
data.comment: One of humanity's enduring contributions to the cosmos, the wrench represents the essence of our species. A simple, effective and spiritually barren tool, use it to build and deconstruct a variety of {LINK:StructurePage;structures}

data.name: Thing_MotherboardLogic_Description
data.value: Motherboards are connected to {THING:StructureComputer}s to perform various technical functions. The {LINK:Norsec;Norsec-designed} K-cops logic motherboard allows {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} to set variables and actions on specific {LINK:LogicUnitPage;logic}-controlled items.
data.comment: Motherboards are connected to {THING:StructureComputer}s to perform various technical functions. The {LINK:Norsec;Norsec-designed} K-cops logic motherboard allows {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} to set variables and actions on specific {LINK:LogicUnitPage;logic}-controlled items.

data.name: Thing_MotherboardSorter_Description
data.value: Motherboards are connected to {THING:StructureComputer}s to perform various technical functions. The {LINK:Norsec;Norsec-designed} K-cops 10-10 sorter motherboard permits {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} to control which items a {THING:StructureSorter} does, and does not, permit to pass.
data.comment: Motherboards are connected to {THING:StructureComputer}s to perform various technical functions. The {LINK:Norsec;Norsec-designed} K-cops 10-10 sorter motherboard permits {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeers} to control which items a {THING:StructureSorter} does, and does not, permit to pass.

data.name: Thing_MothershipCore_Description
data.value: A relic of from an earlier era of space ambition, {LINK:Sinotai;Sinotai's} mothership cores formed the central element of a generation's space-going creations. While Sinotai's pivot to smaller, modular craft upset some purists, motherships continue to be built and maintained by dedicated enthusiasts.
data.comment: A relic of from an earlier era of space ambition, {LINK:Sinotai;Sinotai's} mothership cores formed the central element of a generation's space-going creations. While Sinotai's pivot to smaller, modular craft upset some purists, motherships continue to be built and maintained by dedicated enthusiasts.

data.name: Thing_OrganLungs_Description
data.value: Lungs are delicate organs. Keeping them at the correct temperature and pressure is advisable.
data.comment: Lungs are delicate organs. Keeping them at the correct temperature and pressure is advisable.

data.name: Thing_SpaceShuttle_Description
data.value: An antiquated {LINK:Sinotai;Sinotai} transport craft, long since decommissioned.
data.comment: An antiquated {LINK:Sinotai;Sinotai} transport craft, long since decommissioned.

data.name: Thing_StructureActiveVent_Description
data.value: The active vent is a powered device for maintaining {LINK:GasPage;gas} pressure by pumping gas into (or out of) a pipe network. The vent has two modes: 'Outward' sets it to pump gas into a space until pressure is reached; 'Inward' sets it to pump gas out until pressure is reached. The pressure parameter can be set on a connected {THING:StructureConsole}. Default pressure is 101kPa for Outward; 0kPa for Inward ...
data.comment: The active vent is a powered device for maintaining {LINK:GasPage;gas} pressure by pumping gas into (or out of) a pipe network. The vent has two modes: 'Outward' sets it to pump gas into a space until pressure is reached; 'Inward' sets it to pump gas out until pressure is reached. The pressure parameter can be set on a connected {THING:StructureConsole}. Default pressure is 101kPa for Outward; 0kPa for Inward ...

data.name: Thing_StructureAirConditioner_Description
data.value:
Built using the {THING:ItemKitAtmospherics}, the {LINK:ExMin;ExMin-designed} air conditioner is used to raise or lower input gas temperature.
The unit has three pipe connections: input, output, and waste. Gas fed into the input will be heated or cooled to reach the target temperature, while the opposite will happen to gas on the waste network.
Multiple Efficiency Multipliers can effect the amount of energy the Air Conditioner uses, and these can be view on the unit's green Information Panel. As the temperature difference between input and waste increases, the Temperature Differential Efficiency Multiplier will decrease. If input or waste temperature is extremely hot or cold, the Operational Temperature Efficiency will decrease. If the input or waste pipe has approach low pressures, the Pressure Efficiency will decrease.
{THING:StructurePipeRadiator}s may be useful in bringing extreme pipe temperatures back towards normal world temperatures.
For more information on using the air conditioner, consult the {LINK:TemperatureControlPage;temperature control} Guides page.
data.comment:
Built using the {THING:ItemKitAtmospherics}, the {LINK:ExMin;ExMin-designed} air conditioner is used to raise or lower input gas temperature.
The unit has three pipe connections: input, output, and waste. Gas fed into the input will be heated or cooled to reach the target temperature, while the opposite will happen to gas on the waste network.
Multiple Efficiency Multipliers can effect the amount of energy the Air Conditioner uses, and these can be view on the unit's green Information Panel. As the temperature difference between input and waste increases, the Temperature Differential Efficiency Multiplier will decrease. If input or waste temperature is extremely hot or cold, the Operational Temperature Efficiency will decrease. If the input or waste pipe has approach low pressures, the Pressure Efficiency will decrease.
{THING:StructurePipeRadiator}s may be useful in bringing extreme pipe temperatures back towards normal world temperatures.
For more information on using the air conditioner, consult the {LINK:TemperatureControlPage;temperature control} Guides page.

data.name: Thing_StructureAirlock_Description
data.value: The standard airlock is a powered portal that forms the main component of an airlock chamber. As long as the airlock is not locked, it can be manually opened using a crowbar.
data.comment: The standard airlock is a powered portal that forms the main component of an airlock chamber. As long as the airlock is not locked, it can be manually opened using a crowbar.

data.name: Thing_StructureAreaPowerControl_Description
data.value: An Area Power Control (APC) has three main functions: Its primary purpose is to regulate power flow, ensuring uninterrupted performance from devices and machinery, especially those with a fluctuating draw. APCs also create sub-networks, as no devices on the far side of an APC are visible on the main network. Lastly, an APC charges batteries, which can provide backup power to the sub-network in the case of an outage. Note that an APC requires a battery to stabilize power draw. It also has two variants, each allowing power to flow in one direction only.
data.comment: An Area Power Control (APC) has three main functions: Its primary purpose is to regulate power flow, ensuring uninterrupted performance from devices and machinery, especially those with a fluctuating draw. APCs also create sub-networks, as no devices on the far side of an APC are visible on the main network. Lastly, an APC charges batteries, which can provide backup power to the sub-network in the case of an outage. Note that an APC requires a battery to stabilize power draw. It also has two variants, each allowing power to flow in one direction only.

data.name: Thing_StructureBackPressureRegulator_Description
data.value: Unlike the {THING:StructurePressureRegulator}, which closes when the input exceeds a given pressure, the back pressure regulator opens when input pressure reaches a given value.
data.comment: Unlike the {THING:StructurePressureRegulator}, which closes when the input exceeds a given pressure, the back pressure regulator opens when input pressure reaches a given value.

data.name: Thing_StructurePurgeValve_Description
data.value: Allows for removal of pressurant gas and evaporated liquids from a liquid pipe. Similar in function to a {THING:StructureBackPressureRegulator} the {THING:StructurePurgeValve} moves gas from the input liquid pipe to the output gas pipe aiming to keep the pressure of the input at the target setting.
data.comment: Allows for removal of pressurant gas and evaporated liquids from a liquid pipe. Similar in function to a {THING:StructureBackPressureRegulator} the {THING:StructurePurgeValve} moves gas from the input liquid pipe to the output gas pipe aiming to keep the pressure of the input at the target setting.

data.name: Thing_StructurePressurantValve_Description
data.value: Pumps gas into a liquid pipe in order to raise the pressure
data.comment: Pumps gas into a liquid pipe in order to raise the pressure

data.name: Thing_StructureCondensationValve_Description
data.value: Allows for the removal of any liquids in gas pipes. This is often caused by gases condensing to liquids as they cool down.
data.comment: Allows for the removal of any liquids in gas pipes. This is often caused by gases condensing to liquids as they cool down.

data.name: Thing_StructureBattery_Description
data.value: Providing large-scale, reliable power storage, the {LINK:Sinotai;Sinotai} 'Dianzi' station battery is the heart of most {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} bases. There are a variety of cautions to the design of electrical systems using batteries, and every experienced Stationeer has a story to tell, hence the Stationeer adage: 'Dianzi cooks, but it also frys.' {HEADER:POWER OUTPUT} Able to store up to 3600000W of power, there are no practical limits to its throughput, hence it is wise to use {THING:ItemCableCoilHeavy}. Seasoned electrical engineers will also laugh in the face of those who fail to separate out their power generation networks using an {THING:StructureAreaPowerControl} and {THING:StructureTransformer}.
data.comment: Providing large-scale, reliable power storage, the {LINK:Sinotai;Sinotai} 'Dianzi' station battery is the heart of most {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} bases. There are a variety of cautions to the design of electrical systems using batteries, and every experienced Stationeer has a story to tell, hence the Stationeer adage: 'Dianzi cooks, but it also frys.' {HEADER:POWER OUTPUT} Able to store up to 3600000W of power, there are no practical limits to its throughput, hence it is wise to use {THING:ItemCableCoilHeavy}. Seasoned electrical engineers will also laugh in the face of those who fail to separate out their power generation networks using an {THING:StructureAreaPowerControl} and {THING:StructureTransformer}.

data.name: Thing_StructureBatteryCharger_Description
data.value: The 5-slot {LINK:Xigo;Xigo} battery charger fits the {THING:ItemBatteryCell}, {THING:ItemBatteryCellLarge} and {THING:ItemBatteryCellNuclear}, providing up to 500W to any connected cell. Note: the older design means this device has minor power draw (10W) even when not charging.
data.comment: The 5-slot {LINK:Xigo;Xigo} battery charger fits the {THING:ItemBatteryCell}, {THING:ItemBatteryCellLarge} and {THING:ItemBatteryCellNuclear}, providing up to 500W to any connected cell. Note: the older design means this device has minor power draw (10W) even when not charging.

data.name: Thing_StructureBench_Description
data.value: When it's time to sit, nothing supports you like a bench. This bench is powered, so you can use appliances like the {THING:ApplianceMicrowave}.
data.comment: When it's time to sit, nothing supports you like a bench. This bench is powered, so you can use appliances like the {THING:ApplianceMicrowave}.

data.name: Thing_StructureBlastDoor_Description
data.value: Airtight and almost undamageable, the original 'Millmar' series of blast door was designed by off-world mining giant {LINK:Recurso;Recurso} to protect asteroid-mining facilities from nuclear-incident-level explosive decompression. Short of a pocket-sized singularity blinking into the local space-time frame, there is effectively no limit to the pressure these blast doors can contain - ideal for constructing airlocks in pressure-sensitive environments.
data.comment: Airtight and almost undamageable, the original 'Millmar' series of blast door was designed by off-world mining giant {LINK:Recurso;Recurso} to protect asteroid-mining facilities from nuclear-incident-level explosive decompression. Short of a pocket-sized singularity blinking into the local space-time frame, there is effectively no limit to the pressure these blast doors can contain - ideal for constructing airlocks in pressure-sensitive environments.

data.name: Thing_StructureCableCorner_Description
data.value: Carrying power and data alike, cable coil has come to symbolize the innovation, independence and flexibility of {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} life - so essential, the {LINK:ODA;ODA} designated it an official {LINK:ToolPage;'tool'} during the 3rd Decannual Stationeer Solar Conference. Normal coil has a maximum wattage of 5kW. For higher-current applications, use {THING:ItemCableCoilHeavy}.
data.comment: Carrying power and data alike, cable coil has come to symbolize the innovation, independence and flexibility of {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} life - so essential, the {LINK:ODA;ODA} designated it an official {LINK:ToolPage;'tool'} during the 3rd Decannual Stationeer Solar Conference. data.name: Thing_StructureCamera_Description
data.value: Nothing says 'I care' like a security camera that's been linked a {THING:StructureMotionSensor} and a {THING:StructureConsole} fitted with a {THING:CircuitboardCameraDisplay}. Be there, even when you're not.
data.comment: Nothing says 'I care' like a security camera that's been linked a {THING:StructureMotionSensor} and a {THING:StructureConsole} fitted with a {THING:CircuitboardCameraDisplay}. Be there, even when you're not.

data.name: Thing_StructureCentrifuge_Description
data.value:
If a {THING:StructureRecycler} or unbalanced {THING:StructureFurnace} outputs {LINK:ReagentPage;reagent} mixture rather than the desired {LINK:IngotPage;ingots}, a centrifuge allows you to reclaim the raw {LINK:OrePage;ore}. It also refines {THING:ItemDirtyOre} produced from the {THING:StructureDeepMiner}. Its bigger brother {THING:StructureCombustionCentrifuge} can be used to process items significantly faster.
Items processed by the centrifuge will be de-gassed
data.comment:

It also refines {THING:ItemDirtyOre} produced from the {THING:StructureDeepMiner}. Its bigger brother {THING:StructureCombustionCentrifuge} can be used to process items significantly faster.
Items processed by the centrifuge will be de-gassed

data.name: Thing_StructureChair_Description
data.value: One of the universe's many chairs, optimized for bipeds with somewhere between zero and two upper limbs.
data.comment: One of the universe's many chairs, optimized for bipeds with somewhere between zero and two upper limbs.

data.name: Thing_StructureChuteBin_Description
data.value: The {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer's} goal is to make off-world survival less of a struggle for themselves, and those who will follow in their footsteps. Like most {LINK:Recurso;Recurso}-designed systems, chute bins are simple and robust powered items, allowing items to be manually passed into chute networks by pulling a lever. They can also be programmed with {LINK:LogicUnitPage;logic} to operate automatically, although full automation requires the use items such as a {THING:StructureSDBHopper}.
data.comment: The {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer's} goal is to make off-world survival less of a struggle for themselves, and those who will follow in their footsteps. Like most {LINK:Recurso;Recurso}-designed systems, chute bins are simple and robust powered items, allowing items to be manually passed into chute networks by pulling a lever. They can also be programmed with {LINK:LogicUnitPage;logic} to operate automatically, although full automation requires the use items such as a {THING:StructureSDBHopper}.

data.name: Thing_StructureChuteCorner_Description
data.value: Chutes act as pipes for items. Use them to connect various {LINK:ImportExportPage;import/export} equipment together such as the {THING:StructureVendingMachine} and printers like the {THING:StructureAutolathe}. The aim for any {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} is to make off-world survival less of a struggle for themselves, and those who will follow in their footsteps. Chute corners are fundamental components of chute networks, which allow the transport of items between machines with {LINK:ImportExportPage;import/export} slots, such as the {THING:StructureFurnace} and other automatable structures.
data.comment: Chutes act as pipes for items. Use them to connect various {LINK:ImportExportPage;import/export} equipment together such as the {THING:StructureVendingMachine} and printers like the {THING:StructureAutolathe}. The aim for any {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} is to make off-world survival less of a struggle for themselves, and those who will follow in their footsteps. Chute corners are fundamental components of chute networks, which allow the transport of items between machines with {LINK:ImportExportPage;import/export} slots, such as the {THING:StructureFurnace} and other automatable structures.

data.name: Thing_StructureChuteInlet_Description
data.value: The aim for any {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} is to make off-world survival less of a struggle for themselves, and those who will follow in their footsteps. The chute inlet is an aperture by which items can be introduced to {LINK:ImportExportPage;import/export} networks. Note that its origins in zero-gravity mining means chute inlets are unpowered and permanently open, rather than interactable, allowing objects to be thrown in. They can be connected to {LINK:LogicUnitPage;logic} systems to monitor throughput.
data.comment: The aim for any {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} is to make off-world survival less of a struggle for themselves, and those who will follow in their footsteps. The chute inlet is an aperture by which items can be introduced to {LINK:ImportExportPage;import/export} networks. Note that its origins in zero-gravity mining means chute inlets are unpowered and permanently open, rather than interactable, allowing objects to be thrown in. They can be connected to {LINK:LogicUnitPage;logic} systems to monitor throughput.

data.name: Thing_StructureChuteJunction_Description
data.value: The aim for any {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} is to make off-world survival less of a struggle for themselves, and those who will follow in their footsteps. Chute junctions are fundamental components of chute networks, allowing merging or splitting of these networks. When combined with a programmed {THING:StructureSorter}, items can be sent down different paths to various machines with {LINK:ImportExportPage;import/export} slots.
data.comment: The aim for any {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} is to make off-world survival less of a struggle for themselves, and those who will follow in their footsteps. data.name: Thing_StructureChuteOutlet_Description
data.value: The aim for any {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} is to make off-world survival less of a struggle for themselves, and those who will follow in their footsteps. The chute outlet is an aperture for exiting items from {LINK:ImportExportPage;import/export} networks. data.name: Thing_StructureChuteStraight_Description
data.value: Chutes act as pipes for items. Use them to connect various {LINK:ImportExportPage;import/export} equipment together such as the {THING:StructureVendingMachine} and printers like the {THING:StructureAutolathe}. The aim for any {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} is to make off-world survival less of a struggle for themselves, and those who will follow in their footsteps. Chutes are fundamental components of chute networks, which allow the transport of items between any machine or device with an {LINK:ImportExportPage;import/export} slot.

data.name: Thing_StructureCompositeDoor_Description
data.value: {LINK:Recurso;Recurso's} composite doors are rated to 300kPa, which is more than sufficient for most purposes they were designed for. However, steep pressure differentials are not your friend.
data.comment: {LINK:Recurso;Recurso's} composite doors are rated to 300kPa, which is more than sufficient for most purposes they were designed for. However, steep pressure differentials are not your friend.

data.name: Thing_StructureCompositeFloorGrating_Description
data.value: While aesthetics rank low on the ladder of {LINK:Stationeers;Stationeer} concerns, composite gratings allow the concealment of unsightly cables on floors, walls and ceilings.
